body.name: Pampers Pure Protection Diapers Newborn - Size 0, 76 Count, Hypoallergenic Premium Disposable Baby Diapers

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: Pampers Pure Protection diapers are gentle on skin while providing outstanding leak protection
Nourish and protect skin with our absorbent liner enriched with shea butter and outer cover made with premium cotton* (*Soft outer cover contains 15% cotton)
Hypoallergenic and free of elemental chlorine, fragrance, parabens, natural rubber and latex* (*0% PARABENS AND LATEX: Latex - natural rubber)
Made with FSC-certified sustainably sourced pulp, 100% certified renewable energy, and 0% manufacturing waste to landfill* (*All Global Baby Care factories. Diaper manufacturing in North America)
Featuring adorable designer prints and reassuring wetness indicator, so you always know when it's time for a change
New look! Product and packaging may vary
body.description: Your search for pure protection that works is over! Pampers Pure Protection diapers are gentle on skin while providing the absorbency and leak protection you trust from Pampers. Our absorbent liner is enriched with shea butter to help nourish and protect skin, and our outer cover enhanced with premium cotton* makes these diapers irresistibly soft and breathable. We've thoughtfully chosen all our ingredients to care for your baby's precious skin. But the ingredients we've chosen to leave out are just as important. That's why Pampers Pure Protection diapers are hypoallergenic and free of elemental chlorine, fragrance, parabens, natural rubber and latex**. Pampers Pure Protection diapers are made with sustainably sourced, premium cotton and 100% certified renewable energy. Plus, our designer boutique prints make Pampers Pure Protection diapers just as precious as they are protecting. Use together with Pampers Aqua Pure Wipes for healthy skin. *Soft outer cover contains 15% cotton. **0% PARABENS AND LATEX: Latex - natural rubber.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 0% Chlorine Bleaching, Fragrance, Parabens & Latex* Proven hypoallergenic, Pampers Pure Protection diapers are also made without all EU 26 allergens. “Our elemental chlorine-free fluff pulp is sustainably sourced and certified by the Forest Stewardship Council or the Program for the Endorsement of Forest Certification forest management standards.” Up to 12 Hours of Protection Designed to pull wetness away from your baby’s skin and lock it away for up to 12 hours. Cotton Enhanced Made with breathable premium cotton, soft plant-based fibers, sustainably sourced fluff pulp, and other thoughtfully selected materials. *The Seal of Cotton and cotton enhanced are trademarks of Cotton Incorporated. cotton enhanced soft outercover contains 15% cotton. Trusted Protection Made to help keep your baby’s skin dry and healthy, Pampers is proud to be the #1 Pediatrician Recommended Brand.
Shea Butter Enriched Liner Shea Butter Enriched Liner Our liner is enriched with nourishing shea butter to protect your baby’s delicate skin.

Sara’s Story Sara is a lead scientist at Pampers but, first and foremost, a mom of twin girls. After working at Pampers for 12 years, Sara's perspective quickly changed when her daughters were born prematurely. Her experience drove Sara to help create Pampers Pure Protection: the first-ever diaper that combines Pampers trusted protection with thoughtfully selected materials and zero fragrance. Pampers Pure Protection diapers are also made without all EU 26 allergens.

Absorbent Core Made with totally chlorine-free fluff pulp, mineral-based odor absorber, and super absorbent polymer for up to 12 hours of dryness. Shea Butter Enriched Liner Plant-based and polypropylene liner wicks wetness and mess away from your baby’s skin and is also enriched with shea butter to protect skin. Soft Outer Material Made for softness and breathability with premium cotton, polypropylene, polyethylene, and a polyester blend. Plus our adorable prints made with inks that do not use disperse dyes. Wetness Indicator Made with a pH-sensitive strip that changes colors to tell you when your baby may need a change.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pamper Your Baby with Pure Comfort and Protection - Pampers Pure Protection Diapers
reviews.reviewText: When it comes to your baby, their comfort and well-being are your top priorities. Pampers Pure Protection Diapers, available in a 168-count pack in Size 3, are the ideal choice for parents who want to ensure their baby experiences the best in comfort and protection. Here's why these diapers should be your go-to choice:Pure Comfort: Pampers Pure Protection diapers are designed with your baby's comfort in mind. The hypoallergenic, cotton-like softness keeps your little one's delicate skin happy and irritation-free.Outstanding Leak Protection: These diapers provide up to 12 hours of leak protection, ensuring your baby stays dry and comfortable throughout the day and night. Say goodbye to messy leaks and diaper changes in the middle of the night.Pampers' Trusted Quality: Pampers is a name synonymous with quality in the world of baby care. These diapers are crafted with the same commitment to excellence that has made Pampers a trusted brand for generations.Sustainably Sourced Materials: Pampers Pure Protection diapers are made with responsibly sourced materials, making them a choice that's not just good for your baby but also for the environment.Wetness Indicator: The wetness indicator is a handy feature that lets you know when it's time for a diaper change. It takes the guesswork out of knowing when your baby needs a fresh diaper.In conclusion, Pampers Pure Protection Diapers are more than just diapers; they are a promise of pure comfort, protection, and quality for your baby. They are designed to keep your baby dry, comfortable, and happy, allowing you to focus on making precious memories together. With Pampers, you're not just choosing a diaper; you're choosing peace of mind and the best for your baby. Make Pampers Pure Protection your top choice for diapering, and let your baby experience pure comfort and protection, every day and every night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These have been our diaper of choice since day one. We were worried about harsh chemicals/dyes/fragrances on our little one's body. These are fantastic, "CLEAN" diapers, and they've worked great for our baby. We have had no issues with rashes or skin reactions, and they seem comfortable enough on our baby. We have used every size, and plan to continue using this diaper.Our only issue (that's not really an issue) is that at SOME point, your baby will likely not be able to wear these at night. Our baby turned into a tummy sleeper around 5 months, and all their urine would pool at the front of the diaper (b/c of sleeping on tummy), and their pee would leak out the front. The front of the diaper is smaller than the back, which is why this happens. We had to purchase a nighttime diaper, and the issue was solved. These diapers are perfect for during the day though. I recommend them to all my mom friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only daytime diaper we buy - and we tried a lot!
reviews.reviewText: I'm a first time mom with sensitive skin so when I was getting ready for baby I spent a lot of time trying to find the best diapers for him. I decided to try several different diapers in the beginning, find the one that works best and stick with it. Pampers Pure won that experiment and it has been the only diaper we've used for daytime since (we are up to size 4 during the day now). A lot of the reviews I read at the time scared me - bad rashes, diapers ripping open and beads spilling out, huge blowouts and leaks. While there is no way to know what will give your baby a rash until you try it because every baby is different, I can at least say that since I've stuck to Pampers Pure I've had zero of any kind of incidents like that. So if your agonizing over diapers choice right now like I was, I highly recommend giving these a try.Details:- These claim to have less chemicals than other diapers. I didn't do a deep dive into all the chemicals used in diapers (even these have chemicals) because I knew it would freak me out, but I at least feel good about it being one of the better disposable diapers available in that respect.- That line that turns from yellow to blue to indicate wetness extends from the front to the back and is IMMENSELY helpful.- The muted pastel colors and cute (sometimes pretty random) patterns are enjoyable!- I really like the little ruffles and straps on these compared to others. They don't feel scratchy or rough.- They hold a lot of...well you know!- They don't have a gross chemical smell like some of the other diapers I tried.- SIGN UP FOR THE REWARDS FROM THE START! There is an easy to use app and the codes are on the plastic wrapping (see picture). I ignored them for so long and I missed out on so many points. I am sad about it.- The boxes they come in are really sturdy and have little carry handles. We reuse them for all sorts of things.
Mi hijo tiene piel sensible y estos son los únicos que no le dejan marcas, nos encantan
It was our gift to somebody
I love these diapers. They do not have any chemical perfume smell. They are very absorbent-other diapers leak overnight but these seem to hold the wetness much better.
The product price might be high on sometime try to purchase in lightning deal.
I make diaper cakes and buying best quality diapers is very important to me .
